title: AN IDLE ROBOT , ID TYPEFACE ?
content:
Can anybody identify this font ?

Many Thanks in advance !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [P1010815.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830095803/http:/typophile.com/files/P1010815.JPG) | 526.02 KB |

 [‹ Serif font, bad scan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830095803/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46899 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Beverly Hills Hotel logo 50s script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830095803/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47054 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ashleyco

comments.content:
Hi Ash,

that seems to be [Legerdemain (Elektrik)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830095803/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide03.html).  
F
One of the better FontBank fonts for sure.

I quite like this. Do you know whether this is digitally available?

S

Have a look at [this old thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080830095803/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13289).  
F
